meal_plan.dishes: Sweet potato hash with turkey sausage and spinach
meal_plan.portion_size: 1 cup diced sweet potatoes, 2 turkey sausage links, 1 cup spinach

meal_plan.dishes: Sushi bowl with cauliflower rice, avocado, and chicken
meal_plan.portion_size: 1 cup cauliflower rice, 1/2 avocado, 3 oz grilled chicken
1 cup bell pepper slices, 1/4 cup guacamole

meal_plan.dishes: Beef stir-fry with broccoli and cauliflower rice
meal_plan.portion_size: 4 oz beef strips, 1 cup broccoli, 1 cup cauliflower rice
